nodes.documentation:
@dev This function is used to checking the order status.
@param order_id This is the order id of the order that is checking status.
nodes.name: check_order_status_shipment

params.order_id: The id of the order to be cancelled.

cancel_order(uint256).return: True if the order is cancelled, false otherwise.

check_order_status_customer(uint256,uint.details: This function is used to checking the order status.

params.order_id: This is the order id of the order that is checking status.
params.seller_id: This is the seller id of the seller who is selling the product.

check_order_status_customer(uint256,uint.return: This return the order status and product status.

check_order_status_seller(uint256,uint25.details: This function is used to checking the order status.

params.order_id: This is the order id of the order that is checking status.

check_order_status_seller(uint256,uint25.return: The status of the order and status of the product.

check_order_status_shipment(uint256,uint.details: This function is used to checking the order status.

params.order_id: This is the order id of the order that is checking status.

give_order(uint256,uint256).details: This function is used to give an order to a customer.

params.product_id: This is the product id of the product that is being ordered.
params.seller_id: This is the seller id of the seller who is selling the product.

receive_and_prepare_the_order(uint256).details: This function is used receive the order by the seller.

params.order_id: The id of the seller to be preparing.

receive_and_ship_the_order(uint256).details: This function is used receive the order from the delivery person.

params.order_id: The id of the seller to be preparing.

receive_order(uint256).details: This function is used for the receiving the order.

params.order_id: The id of the order to be received.

receive_order(uint256).return: True if the order is received, false otherwise.

register_customer().details: This function is used to register a customer in the system.

register_seller().details: This function is used to add a new seller.
register_seller().return: True if the seller is added, false otherwise.

register_shipment().details: This function is used to add a new delivery person.
register_shipment().return: True if the seller is added, false otherwise.

transfer_order_to_shipment(uint256).details: This function is used to transfer the order to the delivery person.

params.order_id: The id of the order to be delivered.

transfer_order_to_shipment(uint256).return: True if the order is delivered, false otherwise.

update_status_to_cancelled_and_damaged(u.details: This function is used to update the order status to cancelled and damaged.

params.order_id: The id of the order to be updated.

update_status_to_cancelled_and_not_damag.details: This function is used to update the order status to cancelled and not damaged.

params.order_id: The id of the order to be updated.

update_status_to_ofd_and_damaged(uint256.details: This function is used to update the order status to outfordelivery and damaged.

params.order_id: The id of the order to be delivered.

update_status_to_ofd_and_not_damaged(uin.details: This function is used to update the order status to outfordelivery and not damaged.

params.order_id: The id of the order to be updated.

update_status_to_received_and_damaged(ui.details: This function is used to update the order status to received and damaged.

params.order_id: The id of the order to be updated.

update_status_to_received_and_not_damage.details: This function is used to update the order status to received and not damaged.

params.order_id: The id of the order to be updated.
